use_case.title: Reorder Portal Tabs

trigger.value: PA desires to change position of a Portal Tab relative to the others.

use_case.basic_path:
1. The Portal Administrator selects the 'Configure Portal' link.
  2. The PA then selects the portal tab from the list that he wishes to reposition.
  3. When selected, repositioning arrows/links appear next to the tab.
  4. The PA shifts the Tab right or left, as desired.
